sermons.title: MY BELOVED IS MINE
sermons.description: God isn't a distant, impersonal deity. No, He loves us sinful creatures with all His heart, and He longs to make our lives full and happy. Listen to this testimony of one of the Sisters from the little Land of Canaan. Kanaan is the home of the Evangelical Sisterhood of Mary, an international, interdenominational organization founded in 1947 within the framework of the German Evangelical (Protestant) Church. Website: www.kanaan.org

sermons.title: Wall of Fire
sermons.description: This is a sobering message from the mid-eighties about the decline of American morals, the backsliding of the church and the negative influence on young people. The Word foretold all of the things that are coming to pass in our society. The enemy has come in like a flood on this generation, but God still has keeping power. God is not about to let the enemy triumph over his people.
